about.short: The Nutrition Hangout is a locally-owned smoothie and energy bar in Texas City, founded to make nutrient-dense, crave-worthy drinks and snacks that help people feel their best — every day.
about.mission: We focus on high-protein recipes, community events, and fast friendly service. Whether you're fueling up before a workout or treating yourself after, we've got something delicious for you.

owners.bio: Passionate about health, fitness, and community, the owners of The Nutrition Hangout created a space where everyone can enjoy delicious, nutritious treats in a welcoming tropical atmosphere.

faq.question: What are your hours?
faq.answer: We're typically open Monday-Friday 7AM-7PM and Saturday 8AM-5PM. Hours may change, so check our Facebook or Instagram for daily updates!

faq.question: Do you have parking?
faq.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated parking lot in front of our location at 120 Gulf Fwy S in Texas City.

faq.question: Can you accommodate allergies?
faq.answer: Please let us know about any allergies when ordering. Many of our items can be customized. Ask our staff about ingredients for specific items.

faq.question: Do you offer catering?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer catering for events and parties. Contact us to discuss your needs and get a custom quote.

faq.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faq.answer: Ask us about our punch card program! Buy 10 smoothies, get 1 free. (SUGGESTED — confirm with business)

faq.question: Can I order for pickup?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Text your order to (409) 209-7696 for fast pickup service.

seo.title: The Nutrition Hangout — Smoothie & Energy Bar | Texas City, TX
seo.description: Fuel your day with protein-packed smoothies, loaded teas, and healthy snacks at The Nutrition Hangout in Texas City, TX. Locally made, community-loved.
seo.keywords: smoothie bar, nutrition, Texas City, protein shakes, loaded tea, healthy snacks, energy bar

attributions.note: All images provided by business owner. No third-party images used.
